definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Which province is Canada's largest producer of hydro-electricity?
sentences.chinese: 哪一省是加拿大最大的水力发电生产商？

sentences.english: RusHydro said the plant had been shut down.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯水力发电公司说已经关闭了水电站。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, on land, the threat comes from hydropower.
sentences.chinese: 同时，陆地上的主要威胁来自于水力发电。

sentences.english: The main building of a power plant was the reinforced concrete frame building.
sentences.chinese: 某水力发电厂已建主厂房为钢筋混凝土框架结构。

sentences.english: The Itaipu Dam in Brazil is the world's largest hydroelectric power plant.
sentences.chinese: 位于巴西的伊太瀑水坝是全世界最大的水力发电场。

sentences.english: Electricity & Water Authority baishan hydroelectric power plant steel structure anti-corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 水电部白山水力发电厂钢结构防腐。

sentences.english: Conventional constant speed constant frequency hydropower generation system always takes up a dominant position in hydropower generation system.
sentences.chinese: 传统的恒速恒频发电一直在水力发电中占据主导地位。

sentences.english: But hydropower companies—it is fair to say they are not happy with me.
sentences.chinese: 但是水力发电公司，老实说它们对我很不高兴。

sentences.english: Hydropower plants in Hunan province are producing less that a third of their capacity.
sentences.chinese: 湖南省的水力发电场发电不足容量的三分之一。

sentences.english: Bhutan"s hydropower potential and its attraction for tourists are key resources.
sentences.chinese: 不丹的水力发电能力和其对游客的吸引是主要的财源。

sentences.english: Hydro power and nuclear power cost about the same amount.
sentences.chinese: 水力发电与核能发电的成本差不多是相同的。

sentences.english: Several hydroelectric power plants have been built in the Sun Moon Lake since 1919.
sentences.chinese: 1919年开始，日月潭周边建了几座水力发电厂。

sentences.english: While writing this, the microhydro plant is being implemented, and here are some photos of the process.
sentences.chinese: 微型水力发电厂正在实施，这里有一些照片的过程。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is the world's largest water-control and hydropower project .
sentences.chinese: 三峡大坝是世界上最大的治水和水力发电项目。

definition: to generate electricity/to send a telegram
fired power plant (i.e. fired by coal, oil or gas)
